name: DIMENSION TRIPPER
description:
DIMENSION TRIPPER was created in about a week for the 2022 PyGame Summer Jam.

All art assets, music, and code were created within the jam period by Vexing Voyage Games, aka Vanja Venezia.

 Discord handle: badslime#5993 

Default Controls: Arrow keys
Move player / Navigate menus
ZShoot in movement direction / Confirm
XStand still and aim 
EscapePause game

Features:
  • Fully customizable keyboard controls
  • Local high score tracking
  • Fullscreen or windowed play
  • Ten stages that loop with increased difficulty past the first loop
  • Screen shake can be disabled
  • Music and FX volume can be set separately

Gameplay:
  • Race against the clock to collect all the energy orbs in the current dimension.
  • If you can collect all the energy orbs before the portal to the next dimension spawns, you get a bonus energy orb.
  • Eye Guys will chase you through time and space, shoot them with mind bullets!
  • Collect a bubble shield to survive an extra hit.
  • Collect mind fuel to power up your mind bullets and increase their size and speed!
  • Collect a POW block to neutralize all Eye Guys currently on screen

Credits:
  • Vexing Voyage Games is Vanja Venezia
  • All art, music, and code is original outside of Motorola Screentype font and Squirrel3 noise function
  • Motorola Screen type font by R P N (dafont)
  • Squirrel3 noise function by Squirrel Eiserloh
  • Made with PyGame, GIMP (graphics), Bfxr (sound fx), and FL Studio (music)
